data.md:MetaData: Changes in growth parameters of cultured coccolithophores and isotopic composition of coccolith calcite with salinity
The effect of salinity on the biogeochemistry of the coccolithophores with implications for coccolith-based isotopic proxies
The table shows the physicochemical parameters of the medium and the data measured for cell division rates, cell size and oxygen and carbon isotope of coccoliths calcite according to salinity.
